scene_description_enriched: A group of figures, predominantly men with varied hairstyles and beards, are depicted looking upwards with expressions of awe and devotion. Their hands are clasped or raised in prayer. One figure in the foreground wears a blue tunic and a red garment, while another wears a purple tunic and a green cloak. A golden background suggests a divine or heavenly setting. The scene likely represents a moment of spiritual contemplation or divine revelation.
